mapper.insert: insert into honey_badgers.cart (id, cust_id, quantity, unit_price, amount, kitchen_name, biz_name, menu_id, menu_name) values (#{id}, #{custId}, #{quantity}, #{unitPrice}, #{amount}, #{kitchenName}, #{bizName}, #{menuId}, #{menuName})
